message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product. I think it would be really valuable to you, so I'm offering it to you for $95.
I'm interested in the product, but $95 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $90. I believe this product will really benefit you and $90 is a fair price.
I'm still not convinced that $90 is the best price for me. I'm willing to pay $87 for the product.
